text: Rija is a small settlement in Jubek State, South Sudan, about 6 km east of Dollo(2016): "South Sudan: Central equatoria - Base Map (as of 15 December 2016)". Médecins Sans Frontières. From the ReliefWeb.int site, accessed on 2019-03-24. and 60 km west and 15 km south of the state capital Juba.(2013): "South Sudan: Central Equatoria State - Detailed Transport Map (as of 17 Jan 2013)". World Food Programme, Logistics Cluster. From the ReliefWeb.int site, accessed on 2019-03-24.Google Maps: "Rija". Accessed on 2019-03-23 ==References== Category:Populated places in Jubek State
title: Rija, South Sudan
